labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.client_settings: Dutch, last regular stable build I think. (is it 0.0.298?)
data.expected_result: Discord plays the  stream without crashing and just normally shows the ad.
data.short_description: Discord crashes when viewing Twitch.tv streams
data.steps_to_repro: - Send someone a link of a stream in a personal chat, make them watch it and when the ad is about to show up the discord app crashes and restarts. It was just a regular friend of mine who sent the message, not a blocked user.
